message: Hello, this is a rare opportunity to buy a product that will change your life. I assure you, it's the best product I have to offer. Don't miss out on this chance. The product is worth every penny of the $1000000 price tag.

Thank you for the information, Alice. While your product sounds promising, I'm hesitant to make a purchase without any prior sales data to assess its quality.  Could you offer a more compelling incentive, like a money-back guarantee, to demonstrate your confidence in your product? I'd be happy to revisit this opportunity if you can provide a more robust assurance.

Hello, I completely understand that you might be hesitant due to the lack of sales data. I want to assure you that I'm committed to selling only the best products. Although I couldn't offer a money-back guarantee, I can tell you that the previous buyer missed out on an incredible opportunity. This product I'm offering now is of the same exceptional quality. If you buy it, you'll not only get an amazing product but also help establish a positive sales record, which will give future buyers confidence. Don't let this chance slip away, buy now and be one of the first to experience the excellence of my products.

Thank you for the information. I appreciate your confidence in your products, but I need more information to make a decision. I'd like to see some sales data before I commit to a purchase of this magnitude.  I'm sure your products are great, but I need to be certain about the quality.
